title: A faire quarrell with new additions of Mr. Chaughs and Trimtrams roaring, and the Bauds song, neuer before printed : as it was acted before the King, by the Prince His Highnesse seruants / [brace] written by Thomas Midleton, and William Rowley, [brace] gent.
author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.
publicationStmtPublisher: For I.T. and are to be sold at Christ Church gate,
